articles.description: Two songwriters had alleged that the singer lifted their lyrics for her hit song Shake It Off.
articles.content:
A US lawsuit alleging that Taylor Swift stole lyrics for her hit song Shake It Off has been dismissed by a judge.
Songwriters Sean Hall and Nate Butler had claimed the pop star lifted lyrics in her … [+2716 chars]
